This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{JE}} [[Java Edition Alpha v1.1|Alpha v1.1]].x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with Alpha v1.0.x releases.

== Mobs ==
=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Hostile mobs]]
|{{Animate|Creeper JE3 BE1.png;Skeleton JE1.png;Zombie JE1.png;Spider JE3 BE2.png;Slime JE2 BE1.png|84px}}
|Can now spawn in multiplayer.
|}

=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}}
|-

|[[File:Compass JE1.gif|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|B1= Iron Ingot
|A2= Iron Ingot
|B2= Redstone Dust
|C2= Iron Ingot
|B3= Iron Ingot

}}
|Points towards the user's spawn point.

|[[Fishing Rod]]

{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}}
|-
